original_title: Sri Lanka Insurance Marawila Branch relocated
original_body_lines: The Marawila Branch of Sri Lanka Insurance was relocated on the 24th of April to no. 83A, Negombo Road, Marawila.

The occasion was graced by the corporate management of Sri Lanka Insurance, Chandana L. Aluthgama – Chief Executive Officer, Rohitha Amarapala – Deputy General Manager – Human Resources and Employee Relations, Chaminda Gunasinghe – Deputy General Manager – Administrations, Lalith De Silva – Head of Distribution (General Insurance), Jagath Welgama – Assistant General Manager/Head of National Sales (Life) along with the Marawila Branch team, distinguished invitees of Marawila area and customers of the Marawila Branch.
The Marawila SLIC branch will continue to provide total insurance solutions with a hassle free customer experience for the customers in the area.
